heading: the reich stuff
subheading: the free democrats, who hold down the center-right of the german political spectrum, decided to use a picture of adolf hitler on posters urging the state of north rhine-westphalia to hire more teachers. der f&uuml'hrer's likeness appeared over the grim warning, "if we do not move quickly to put more teachers in the schools, our children will look for their own teachers." the poster -- surprise -- was quickly withdrawn in the face of widespread criticism. whatever marketing genius dreamed that one up must have had his lederhosen on a little too tight. wait a minute. they don't wear lederhosen in north rhine-westphalia.
author: wired staff
